subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur made 28 saves for his third shutout in seven games, and Patrik Elias scored twice as the Devils beat the visiting Dallas Stars, 4-0, on Tuesday night.
snippet: Martin Brodeur made 28 saves for his third shutout in seven games, and Patrik Elias scored twice as the Devils beat the visiting Dallas Stars, 4-0, on Tuesday night.
